definition: A professional who provides guidance, support, and treatment to individuals dealing with various psychological or emotional challenges, aiming to improve their mental well-being and overall quality of life. They typically engage in one-on-one sessions or group therapy, employing various therapeutic techniques and approaches to address specific issues and promote personal growth. This term is commonly used to refer to professionals in the field of mental health and counseling.
